1.0.name: wordpress/basic-authentication
1.0.description: With this plugin, you can ask users to authenticate before they can see your Wordpress site. You can either use the WordPress logins to authenticate, or a given password. This plugin can be useful when your website is still under construction or in beta fase. No HTTP Authentication is used.
